duties_responsibilities.duty: Take and record patient blood pressure and EKGs.
Serve as a patient advocate during exams and treatments.
Interview patients to obtain medical information and measure their vital signs, weight, and height.
Prepare patients for physician examinations and treatments.
Record patients' medical history, medications, allergies, vital statistics, and test results in medical records.
Explain treatment procedures, medications, diets, wound care instructions, and physicians' instructions to patients.
Assist physicians during patient examinations and treatments.
Authorize drug refills and provide prescription information to pharmacies under provider direction.
Prepare treatment rooms for patient examinations and keep them clean and organized.
Assess patient condition throughout exams and procedures, notifying physician and RN of any distress.
Responsible for cleaning rooms and medical equipment between each patient and at the end of the day, disposing of infection waste and biohazard materials.
Accurately document all procedures in a timely manner, maintaining patient confidentiality and data integrity in accordance with HIPAA.
Adhere to all safety policies and procedures, supporting a culture of high-quality customer service and participating in department or unit quality improvement activities.
